doc:
Ben Cross https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Cross 0 Harry Bernard Cross (born 16 December 1947), known professionally as Ben Cross, is an English stage and film actor, best known for his portrayal of the British Olympic athlete Harold Abrahams in the 1981 film Chariots of Fire and as Sarek in the 2009 reboot film Star Trek. Harry_Bernard_Cross ( born_16_December_1947 ) , known professionally as Ben_Cross , is an_English_stage_and_film_actor , best_known for his_portrayal of the_British_Olympic_athlete_Harold_Abrahams in the_1981_film_Chariots of Fire and as Sarek in the_2009_reboot_film_Star_Trek .
